episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was in town on Pasio
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into Lana.
The two decided to do some shopping together.

Well, that’s everything I wanted to buy. Now it’s
your turn, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—
Huh? You want to know what I bought?

Today, I got all the supplies I need for my
handmade, Lana original fishing rods.
Hah! I had a feeling you’d take the bait!

To be honest, I’ve suspected for a while now you
might like fishing, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Handmade fishing rods are great.

You can adjust the weight, length, and flexibility
however you like.

If you’re interested in fishing rods, I can teach you
how to make one. What do you say?
That’s the spirit!

I understand all too well. The siren call of the
sea...and the urge to fish up something wonderful!
And I’m a great teacher, so no need to worry!

Once you’ve made your fishing rod, I’ll even show
you a special fishing spot.

We’ll each have our own personalized fishing rods
and set out to sea!
(Say you look forward to it.)
Heh heh! Good answer!
(Ask if you can really fish on Pasio.)
Oh, who cares about details like that?

Let’s get to work on your very own,
totally unique...
[Name:PlayerNickname ] original fishing rod!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lana finished
making their fishing rods and set out to sea.
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Don’t you feel closer to your fishing rod since you
made it yourself?

(Ask what you can catch
around here.)

I heard something BIG appeared around here,
from who knows where. It could be an EPIC catch!
Am I joking? Hmm... Who’s to say?
(Say you’re eager for a big catch.)
Heh heh. That’s what I wanted to hear!

And I heard something BIG showed up around
here. It could be an EPIC catch!
Now then, let’s catch a whopper!

And so they began to fish, but of course,
they didn’t get a single bite.

Lana and [Name:PlayerNickname ] chatted
while they waited, and time slipped past.

Well, we didn’t get that big catch I heard about.
But still...
I got the catch I was aiming for!

And that’s time with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You always seem so busy running around
helping everyone, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

I thought it’d be nice to just take it easy and talk
once in a while. That’s why I invited you.

...Huh? You think all that “big catch” talk was just
bait to reel YOU in?
No, no. Nothing like that.

I really have heard something epic is hiding in the
sea around Pasio.

After all, no one knows what lurks at the bottom
of this vast ocean.
...What? Just like my heart?
Heh heh. You might be right!
